General.Name: Starrex International Ltd
General.Description: Starrex International Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, acquires, manages, and grows companies in the mortgage, real estate, and other financial sectors in the United States. It manages residential appraisals, maintains ordering, tracking, administrative duties, and details; and ensures the timeliness of appraisals handled during a real estate mortgage transaction. The company also provides consumer credit reports to the real estate industry and consumer service companies; and residential real estate evaluation services to third parties. It primarily serves mortgage banks and purchasers of residential real estate. The company was formerly known as Starrex Mining Corporation Limited and changed its name to Starrex International Ltd. in May 2014. Starrex International Ltd. was incorporated in 1982 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: Standard Life Building, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 0M9
